description: Holds the version information for Minecraft Forge.
The private logger for this class.
Returns the current implementation version of Minecraft Forge.
This is retrieved from the {@code Implementation-Version} from the manifest of the JAR where this class resides in. If
that does not exist, then the version is taken from the {@code FORGE_VERSION} {@link System#getenv(String)} environment
variable} (If those do not exist, then a {@link RuntimeException} will be thrown).

tags.return: The implementation version of Minecraft Forge

description: Returns the {@link VersionChecker.Status} for the {@link net.minecraftforge.common.ForgeMod Forge mod}.

tags.return: The version checker status for the Forge mod

description: Returns the more up-to-date version found by the {@link VersionChecker}, or a blank string if none is found.

tags.return: The more up-to-date remote version, or a blank string

description: Returns the current specification version of Forge Mod Loader.
This is retrieved from the {@code Specification-Version} from the manifest of the JAR where this class resides in. If
that does not exist, then the version is taken from the {@code FORGE_SPEC} {@link System#getenv(String) environment
variable} (If those do not exist, then a {@link RuntimeException} will be thrown).

tags.return: The specification version of Minecraft forge

description: Returns the group of the currently running Minecraft Forge implementation.
This is retrieved from the {@code Implementation-Title} from the manifest of the JAR where this class resides in. If
that does not exist, then the version is taken from the {@code FORGE_GROUP} {@link System#getenv(String) environment
variable}. If those do not exist, then the group will default to {@code net.minecraftforge}.

tags.return: The group for the running Minecraft Forge implementation
